Catch Mastery: Archen Premium Timed Research Ticket
This is incredible... I have read about Absofusion, but I never dared to dream I would witness it firsthand.
What about you? Did you ever think you would see something so amazing?
People are so passionate about their dreams. I used to wonder if our differences were irreconcilable, but this has shown me that we all complement each other when we are united.
I do not know if I will be around long enough to see the future Kyurem awaits, but I am excited to work with you to make it a reality.

A stamp rally is an activity where you collect stamps at certain PokéStops and Gyms.
If you visit a PokéStop or Gym where a stamp rally is taking place, a stamp sheet will appear. Follow the directions to collect your stamp!

Some stamp rallies allow you to collect stamps with help from your friends. You can send and receive Gifts from PokéStops with stamps—if you are a {0} or higher with the other Trainer, the recipient will be able to collect the stamp from the Gift, wherever they are!
Some stamp rallies offer items or other rewards for collecting stamps. Collect lots of stamps and see what exciting things you can find!
Collect a stamp to receive rewards!
Collected stamp from {0} for stamp rally: {1}
Go to one of the stamp rally locations to claim this reward.
This event has no end date.
Collect {0} stamps to encounter a Pokémon and receive other rewards!
Collect a stamp to encounter a Pokémon and receive other rewards!
Collect {0} stamps to encounter a Pokémon!
Collect a stamp to encounter a Pokémon!
You can view the stamps you collect on the stamp rally page in your Scrapbook.
This Gift includes a stamp for a stamp rally. Your friend can collect this stamp from wherever they are when they receive this Gift.

Stamp icons will be displayed above the PokéStops included in the stamp rally.

When you tap on these PokéStops, the stamp sheet will appear.
If you have started a stamp rally, a stamp icon will appear in the menu on the right side of the screen. Tap this icon to easily check your progress.
Increased Stardust for successfully completing raids
There you are, %PLAYERNAME%! It looks like Kubfu is working hard under your expert eye.
I imagine it’s very diligent when it comes to training both body and mind. But watch out—soon, the student may become the master!
On that note, every master-in-training should know their strengths and weaknesses. What do you think those are for Kubfu?
Let’s discuss that when you return from your next training session. Good luck!
Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Have you discovered Kubfu’s strengths and weaknesses?
Kubfu is a Fighting-type Pokémon, so it’s strong against Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel types.
On the other hand, it may have a hard time against Flying-, Psychic-, and Fairy-type attacks. Self-awareness is an important part of mastery!
Thanks to you, it seems Kubfu is learning how to forge its way forward. Keep powering up!

Includes: • One additional Candy XL for completing raids and Max Battles • 3× XP awarded for your first spin and first catch each day • Hold 2× as many Gifts in your Item Bag (40 total) • Timed Research that awards 50,000 XP and 50,000 Stardust • And more!
Included rewards: • Encounters with Scyther, Volbeat, Illumise, Cutiefly, Sizzlipede, Kleavor, and Nymble • 2 Premium Raid Passes • 1 Lure Module • 6,000 Stardust • 12,000 XP
Included rewards: • 40 encounters with Archen • Poké Balls and Berries • 12,000 XP and 3,000 Stardust
Included rewards: • Premium in-game items, such as a Premium Battle Pass, a Charged TM, and Rare Candies • Encounters with Totodile with a Special Background • And more!

Included rewards: • Encounters with Bruxish • 2 Lure Modules • 2 Incense • 2,000 Stardust Bruxish found in reward encounters for this research and all other research tasks are more likely to be Shiny!

This Timed Research, which challenges you to complete Field Research tasks, leads to encounters with the featured Pokémon of your choice: Teddiursa, Cubchoo, Pancham, or Stufful!

During the event, Pokémon encountered in this Timed Research have the same chance to be Shiny as those encountered via Field Research.

This Timed Research will be available on March 29, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

Includes: • An encounter with the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion • A higher chance to encounter Shiny Pokémon during the event • Up to 9 free Raid Passes each day from spinning Gym Photo Discs • Event-themed Pokémon hatching from 5 km Eggs • Incense may attract special Pokémon • Branching Special Research focused on Zacian or Zamazenta • Additional Special Trades for a daily total of 6 • 50% Stardust cost for trades • A Collection Challenge for each habitat • Additional daily snapshot surprises • Double the buddy hearts • Hourly Global Challenges to unlock additional bonuses Additional content: • Purchase by April 15 and play between April 8 and April 15 for Timed Research that awards an encounter with Skiddo!
